publication.abstract: Â© The Author 2016. Summary: PathScore quantifies the level of enrichment of somatic mutations within curated pathways, applying a novel approach that identifies pathways enriched across patients. The application provides several user-friendly, interactive graphic interfaces for data exploration, including tools for comparing pathway effect sizes, significance, gene-set overlap and enrichment differences between projects.
publication.title: PathScore: A web tool for identifying altered pathways in cancer data

summary.description: Quantifies the level of enrichment of somatic mutations within curated pathways, applying a novel approach that identifies pathways enriched across patients.
summary.name: PathScore
